title: Vaccines Cause 400% Increase in Spontaneous ABORTIONS (Video)
cleaned_text:
A CDC-funded medical study being published by the medical journal Vaccine has confirmed a shocking link between flu shots and spontaneous abortions in pregnant women. The study was rejected by two previous medical journals before Vaccine agreed to publish it, further underscoring the tendency for medical journals to censor any science that doesn’t agree with their pro-vaccine narratives.

“A study published today in Vaccine suggests a strong association between receiving repeated doses of the seasonal influenza vaccine and miscarriage,” writes CIDRAP, the Center for Infectious Disease Research and Policy.

Podcast Transcript: “A bombshell new study funded by the CDC itself and published in the journal known as “Vaccine” has found a 400% increase in the number of spontaneous abortions in the women who have received flu shots during pregnancy. Now this study was rejected by two other medical journals, before the journal “Vaccine” agreed to publish it. Even then, the editor and chief of that journal has said, essentially, he doesn’t believe the outcome. He doesn’t the study. Now everybody in the vaccine industry is in a state of panic calling for more research to dispel this “puzzling study.” They can’t figure out why vaccines would cause spontaneous abortions. They think it couldn’t possibly be true…” Listen to the full podcast below:

Vaccines cause 400% increase in spontaneous ABORTIONS from NaturalNews on Vimeo.
